verses.verse: Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Though <S%H518><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, yet my mind <S%H5315><s%> could not <S%H369><s%> be toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> cast <S%H7971><s%> them out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my sight, <S%H6440><s%> and let them go forth. <S%H3318><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, Whither <S%H575><s%> shall we go forth? <S%H3318><s%> then thou shalt tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Such as <S%H834><s%> are for death, <S%H4194><s%> to death; <S%H4194><s%> and such as <S%H834><s%> are for the sword, <S%H2719><s%> to the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and such as <S%H834><s%> are for the famine, <S%H7458><s%> to the famine; <S%H7458><s%> and such as <S%H834><s%> are for the captivity, <S%H7628><s%> to the captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

And I will appoint <S%H6485><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them four <S%H702><s%> kinds, <S%H4940><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> to slay, <S%H2026><s%> and the dogs <S%H3611><s%> to tear, <S%H5498><s%> and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> to devour <S%H398><s%> and destroy. <S%H7843><s%>

And I will cause <S%H5414><s%> them to be removed <S%H2189><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> because of <S%H1558><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> shall have pity <S%H2550><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, O Jerusalem? <S%H3389><s%> or who <S%H4310><s%> shall bemoan <S%H5110><s%> thee? or who <S%H4310><s%> shall go aside <S%H5493><s%> to ask <S%H7592><s%> how thou doest? <S%H7965><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> hast forsaken <S%H5203><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou art gone <S%H1980><s%> backward: <S%H268><s%> therefore will I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, and destroy <S%H7843><s%> thee; I am weary <S%H3811><s%> with repenting. <S%H5162><s%>

And I will fan <S%H2219><s%> them with a fan <S%H4214><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> I will bereave <S%H7921><s%> them of children, I will destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> since they return <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> from their ways. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%>

Their widows <S%H490><s%> are increased <S%H6105><s%> to me above the sand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2344><s%> of the seas: <S%H3220><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon them against <S%H5921><s%> the mother <S%H517><s%> of the young men <S%H970><s%> a spoiler <S%H7703><s%> at noonday: <S%H6672><s%> I have caused him to fall <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it suddenly, <S%H6597><s%> and terrors <S%H928><s%> upon the city. <S%H5892><s%>

She that hath borne <S%H3205><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> languisheth: <S%H535><s%> she hath given up <S%H5301><s%> the ghost; <S%H5315><s%> her sun <S%H8121><s%> is gone down <S%H935><s%> while <S%H5750><s%> it was yet day: <S%H3119><s%> she hath been ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded: <S%H2659><s%> and the residue <S%H7611><s%> of them will I deliver <S%H5414><s%> to the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies, <S%H341><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me, my mother, <S%H517><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast borne <S%H3205><s%> me a man <S%H376><s%> of strife <S%H7379><s%> and a man <S%H376><s%> of contention <S%H4066><s%> to the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth! <S%H776><s%> I have neither <S%H3808><s%> lent on usury, <S%H5383><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> men have lent to me on usury; <S%H5383><s%> yet every one <S%H3605><s%> of them doth curse <S%H7043><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Verily <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> it shall be well <S%H2896><s%> with thy remnant; <S%H7611><s%> verily <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> I will cause <S%H853><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> to entreat <S%H6293><s%> thee well in the time <S%H6256><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> and in the time <S%H6256><s%> of affliction. <S%H6869><s%>
Shall iron <S%H1270><s%> break <S%H7489><s%> the northern <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%> and the steel? <S%H5178><s%>

Thy substance <S%H2428><s%> and thy treasures <S%H214><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the spoil <S%H957><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> price, <S%H4242><s%> and that for all <S%H3605><s%> thy sins, <S%H2403><s%> even in all <S%H3605><s%> thy borders. <S%H1366><s%>

And I will make thee to pass <S%H5674><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> is kindled <S%H6919><s%> in mine anger, <S%H639><s%> which shall burn <S%H3344><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you.

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> knowest: <S%H3045><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> me, and visit <S%H6485><s%> me, and revenge <S%H5358><s%> me of my persecutors; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7291><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> me not <S%H408><s%> away in thy longsuffering: <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that for <S%H5921><s%> thy sake I have suffered <S%H5375><s%> rebuke. <S%H2781><s%>

Thy words <S%H1697><s%> were found, <S%H4672><s%> and I did eat <S%H398><s%> them; and thy word <S%H1697><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> unto me the joy <S%H8342><s%> and rejoicing <S%H8057><s%> of mine heart: <S%H3824><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I am called <S%H7121><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> thy name, <S%H8034><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

I sat <S%H3427><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the mockers, <S%H7832><s%> nor rejoiced; <S%H5937><s%> I sat <S%H3427><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of thy hand: <S%H3027><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast filled <S%H4390><s%> me with indignation. <S%H2195><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> my pain <S%H3511><s%> perpetual, <S%H5331><s%> and my wound <S%H4347><s%> incurable, <S%H605><s%> which refuseth <S%H3985><s%> to be healed? <S%H7495><s%> wilt thou be altogether <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1961><s%> unto me as <S%H3644><s%> a liar, <S%H391><s%> and as waters <S%H4325><s%> that fail? <S%H3808><s%> <S%H539><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> If <S%H518><s%> thou return, <S%H7725><s%> then will I bring thee again, <S%H7725><s%> and thou shalt stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me: and if <S%H518><s%> thou take forth <S%H3318><s%> the precious <S%H3368><s%> from the vile, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2151><s%> thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> as my mouth: <S%H6310><s%> let them return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee; but return <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee unto this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> a fenced <S%H1219><s%> brazen <S%H5178><s%> wall: <S%H2346><s%> and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H413><s%> thee, but they shall not <S%H3808><s%> prevail <S%H3201><s%> against thee: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am with <S%H854><s%> thee to save <S%H3467><s%> thee and to deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7451><s%> and I will redeem <S%H6299><s%> thee out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of the terrible. <S%H6184><s%>
